summary: I WOULD LIKE TO REQUEST AN INVESTIGATION AS TO WHY I WAS  ABLE TO PURCHASE A HJC (HONG JIN CROWN) SY-MAX HELMET AS DOT APPROVED, YET IT APPEARS ON DOT TESTING RESULTS (HTTP://WWW.NHTSA.DOT.GOV/CARS/TESTING/COMPLY/FMVSS218/2001S218.HTML)  AS A FAILURE TO MEET FMVSS218. I WOULD LIKE TO REQUEST THE MANUFACTURER REFUND MY  MONEY AND SHOULD BE PENALIZED FOR SELLING A HELMET UNDER A FALSE PRETENSE (NOT ADHERING TO FMVSS218).*JB
